sentences.sContent: They are mostly lack of positiveness psychologically. The psychological source must be found so that they will stop wanting to command.
sentences.sContent_eng: They are mostly lack of positiveness psychologically. The psychological source must be found so that they will stop wanting to command.
sentences.sCn: 这种人大多是心理上缺乏肯定，必须找出心理根源，才能停止不断想挥棒的行为。

words.tran: 积极的；[数] 正的，[化学][医] 阳性的；确定的，肯定的；实际的，真实的；绝对的
